column5: Has anyone ever been to Lost Lake Wilderness Lodge? I am taking my dad and 11 y/o son from July 1 to July 8. We will be fishing primarily for walleye, bass and pike. If anyone has any suggestions/information, I would sure appreciate it as I am trying to do as much homework as I can to make the trip as enjoyable for my son as possible. Thanks, Chris
Bump...Thought I would try once more. Thanks, Chris
Are you talking about Lost Lake Lodge on Lac Seul???????
>Are you talking about Lost Lake Lodge on Lac Seul??????? or Lost Lake near Gowganda ??
Sorry I wasn't specific...Lost Lake Wilderness Lodge near Gowganda
wondering if anyone has a report on this lodge? Looks like a great place.Thanks
Owners are getting a divorce, so the lodge will be going up for sale soon...maybe this year, maybe next.

find some where else my brother son and I spent a week there 2 years ago the food was good, cabin and fishing were not, boats are not well kept and we could not fish several lakes because of boats and motors were not in working order Wendell Eaton
